subject: Most Haunted & The Box
author: April Slaughter
full_text:
Just thought I would drop in to let you all know that Dr. Ciaran
O'Keeffe has borrowed a Mini from our team (the initial prototype) and
will be using it tonight during part of their investigation in
Gettysburg. It is a LIVE event tonight on the Travel Channel beginning
at 8 p.m. EST. It will be interesting to see what they catch with the
box, if anything! :)
